title: Welcome
text:
Welcome my blog. This will be a space to jot down ideas, experiments, and things I find interesting. I love having a nice visualization to go along with code and analysis, so to kick off I’ll just include this incredible image of the Yukon Delta in Alaska.



False-color image of the Yukon Delta, Alaska, USA (source)



Topics
Some major themes will be:

Remote sensing
Environment
Climate
Weather
Demographics
Geospatial data

As well as software and tools such as:

Python
Julia
Machine Learning / Artificial intelligence
Cloud native data
Geospatial software



Tech stack
I’m building this website with Quarto and Pixi.

title: Dr. Colin Hill
text:
I’m an data scientist and physicist working at the intersection of remote sensing, climate, environment and machine learning.
I’ve worked across diverse domains ranging from stellar astrophysics to weather forecasts, from climate data to crops, GHG emissions and soil carbon sequestration. I enjoy working on challenging and impactful problems, and a consistent focus has been creating data-driven insights from sensors using physical principles combined with statistical and machine learning approaches.
